item.title: Static anonymous functions
item.description: Daily Knowledge Drop When using anonymous functions (lambda functions) - in certain use cases static anonymous functions can be used instead to improve performance of the application. Anonymous function Code In the below sample, a function OutputDatetime is called to output the current datetime. However the formatting of the output is determined by a Func (an anonymous function) in conjunction with either the formattedTime string or slimTime string (or any other string format which can be specified).
